label: uncl8035
comment: Code qualifying a type of traffic restriction.

values.label: Required stopover or connection must occur at the board point
values.comment: Required stopover or connection from another station to a means of transport can only be made at the board point.

values.label: Required stopover or connection must occur at the off point
values.comment: Required stopover or connection from another station to a means of transport can only be made at the off point.
